Name: Corona Find Us
About the game: About this game Corona Find Us: A party game about cleaning corona virus. You are going to control a nano technology robot to destroy corona virus in people's lung. Which is the best game for family, you and your friends during the isolation because of the covid-19. Feature • Shared/Split Screen Co-op • Randomly generated levels • No limitation of player numbers (2 to 16players are suggested) • Fancy particle effect
